subs.2.370: You must write the names of four party members present in this plane in the order you want them to be sacrificed, with…
subs.8.320:
(1) being the most suitable candidate, and
(4) the least of the selection.
subs.13.36: You have 90 seconds before we start removing limbs, starting now.

subs.0.240: Each of you have the same four cards in front of you.
subs.3.010: You will each select one card.<div class="divider"/>
subs.5.620: The player who picks the lowest unique option will receive one additional boon.
subs.10.460: All other players will also be affected by this card without merit.

subs.4.950: One member will be selected now to be the liege.

subs.0.260: You were the N-th most suitable candidate in “Democracy”.
subs.5.430: Now you have the opportunity to exact revenge.
subs.11.060: Follow the instructions to choose who is “removed” from the party,
subs.15.940: otherwise the dice will choose for you.
subs.19.530: You have a minute, starting now.

subs.0.290: You will receive an envelope from your liege.
subs.4.020: Each of you can either choose to accept or decline this offer.
subs.9.120: This will be repeated until there are no new lieges, or a successful offer.
subs.15.910: A successful offer must have unanimous support.
